me.aschwartz.cards

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.aschwartz.cards.Deck

  • public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Andrew Schwartz on 4/7/17.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deck()
      Constructs a shuffled deck of 52 cards, numbered 1-13, one for each suit.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Card draw()
      "Draws" the top card from the deck.
      void shuffle()
      Shuffles the cards using Collections.shuffle
      java.lang.String toString()
      Thit method simply returns the cards ArrayList

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Deck

        public Deck()
        Constructs a shuffled deck of 52 cards, numbered 1-13, one for each suit. (From A♠ to K♣.)
        See Also:
        Card

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public Card draw()
        "Draws" the top card from the deck. This gets the top card from the deck, removes it, and then returns it.
        Returns:
        The card from the very top of the deck

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        Shuffles the cards using Collections.shuffle
        See Also:
        Collections

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Thit method simply returns the cards ArrayList
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        ArrayList cards
